sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUB_MER_ID ,SUB_MER_NAME ,SHORT_NAME ,REG_NO ,TAX_NO ,ORGANIZATION_CODE ,REG_ADDR ,LEGAL_PERSON ,LEGAL_IDCARD ,MER_KIND ,CONTACTOR ,CONTACTOR_PHONE ,CONTACTOR_ADDR ,CONTACTOR_EMAIL ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NO ,SETT_AGENCY ,MER_SYS_ID ,AGENT_ID_L1 ,AGENT_ID_L2 ,MCC ,REALMCC ,REGION ,BILL_CYCLE ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,LOGO ,COLOR ,SETT_ACC_TYPE ,SUB_MER_TRACT ,SETTLE_STATUS ,BALANCE ,WITHDRAWALS ,IS_T0 FROM SUB_MER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(SUB_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SHORT_NAME) Like '%'||(#short_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_NO) Like '%'||(#reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TAX_NO) Like '%'||(#tax_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORGANIZATION_CODE) Like '%'||(#organization_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_ADDR) Like '%'||(#reg_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LEGAL_PERSON) Like '%'||(#legal_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LEGAL_IDCARD) Like '%'||(#legal_idcard:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_KIND) Like '%'||(#mer_kind:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR) Like '%'||(#contactor:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_PHONE) Like '%'||(#contactor_phone:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_ADDR) Like '%'||(#contactor_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CONTACTOR_EMAIL) Like '%'||(#contactor_email:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(AGENT_ID_L1) =#agent_id_l1#
(AGENT_ID_L2) =#agent_id_l2#
(MCC) Like '%'||(#mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REALMCC) Like '%'||(#realmcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REGION) Like '%'||(#region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGO) Like '%'||(#logo:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COLOR) Like '%'||(#color:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRACT) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_STATUS) =#settle_status#
(BALANCE) Like '%'||(#balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(WITHDRAWALS) Like '%'||(#withdrawals:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(IS_T0) Like '%'||(#is_t0:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(SUB_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SHORT_NAME) Like '%'||(#short_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_NO) Like '%'||(#reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'

(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(AGENT_ID_L1) =#agent_id_l1#
(AGENT_ID_L2) =#agent_id_l2#
(MCC) Like '%'||(#mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REALMCC) Like '%'||(#realmcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REGION) Like '%'||(#region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'

(SUB_MER_TRACT) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_STATUS) =#settle_status#
(BALANCE) Like '%'||(#balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(WITHDRAWALS) Like '%'||(#withdrawals:VARCHAR#)||'%'
